EmailTemplate.name: Before 2 days project completion date send mail to manager
EmailTemplate.subject: Project Management: Your project will be finished within two days
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!EMS_TM_Project__c.Project_Manager__c},
The project {!EMS_TM_Project__c.Name} is nearing completion with the end date on {!EMS_TM_Project__c.EMS_TM_EndDate__c}. Upon completion, the status of the project will change to ‘Completed’ and the associated assignments will be closed. Please change the end date of the project to extend it, if required. You can find the project record here.
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
